qas.question: In what districts are the majority of businesses service jobs located?
Where are Paris' financial service companies majorly located?
What industry is located in the 1st, 6th, 8th and 9th arrondissements?
What percent of Parisians work in hotels and restaurants?
How many peole work in the La Defense district?

context: The majority of Paris' salaried employees fill 370,000 businesses services jobs, concentrated in the north-western <a0_0>8th, 16th and 17th<a0_0/> arrondissements. Paris' financial service companies are concentrated in the central-western <a1_0>8th and 9th arrondissement<a1_0/> banking and insurance district. Paris' <a2_0>department store<a2_0/> district in the 1st, 6th, 8th and 9th arrondissements employ 10 percent of mostly female Paris workers, with 100,000 of these registered in the retail trade. <a3_0>Fourteen<a3_0/> percent of Parisians work in hotels and restaurants and other services to individuals. Nineteen percent of Paris employees work for the State in either in administration or education. The majority of Paris' healthcare and social workers work at the hospitals and social housing concentrated in the peripheral 13th, 14th, 18th, 19th and 20th arrondissements. Outside Paris, the western Hauts-de-Seine department La Défense district specialising in finance, insurance and scientific research district, employs <a4_0>144,600<a4_0/>, and the north-eastern Seine-Saint-Denis audiovisual sector has 200 media firms and 10 major film studios.
